n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1

print(count)

S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

print(S.count("ABC"))  # 文字列SからABCの文字列の出現回数をカウント

# Set max recursion limit

# Debug output
def chkprint(*args):
    names = {id(v):k for k,v in inspect.currentframe().f_back.f_locals.items()}
    print(', '.join(names.get(id(arg),'???')+' = '+repr(arg) for arg in args))

n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i:i + 3] == "ABC":
        count += 1

print(count)

n = int(input())  # 1行目
